page.title: 06ENERGY
page.content: The {energy}resources available to the villages are much as would be expected.All homes have{electricty}for lighting.Many people cook with electricty and heat their homes.Many new homes have{oil}fired central heating.There is no gas within the village.There is a main{gas}pipe line along the Exeter to Barnstaple road but no pipe for gas into the village.To over come the absence of north sea gas some people heat their homes and cook by {calor gas}which is kept in a tank in the garden .Many people use {soild fuels}either coal or wood for heating and for cooking.In the past a source of energy was{water} and there is a water wheel at the bottom of the village but is not in use
